resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105489</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105489</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206143</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Earthquake Hazards Program</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Erdbeben Riskiert Programm</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Tremblement de terre Met en danger Le 
Programme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Terremoto Hazards O Programa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Terremoto Azzarda Il Programma</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το πρόγραμμα κινδύνων σεισμού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Terremoto Aventura Programa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">offers frequently asked questions about earthquakes, research on earthquakes, and more. Visitors can follow recent seismic acitivity around the world, view hazard maps, or learn what a geophysicist does.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Angebote baten häufig Fragen nach Erdbeben, 
Forschung auf Erdbeben und mehr. Besucher können neuem 
seismischem acitivity um die Welt folgen, Gefahrkarten ansehen oder 
erlernen, was ein geophysicist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">les offres ont fréquemment demandé des questions
sur des tremblements de terre, la recherche sur des tremblements de 
terre, et plus. Les visiteurs peuvent suivre l'acitivity 
séismique récent autour du monde, visualiser des cartes de risque, 
ou apprendre ce qu'un géophysicien .</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">as ofertas pediram freqüentemente perguntas sobre
terremotos, pesquisa sobre terremotos, e mais. Os visitantes 
podem seguir o acitivity seismic recente em torno do mundo, ver mapas 
do perigo, ou aprender o que um geophysicist .</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">le offerte hanno interrogato frequentemente le 
domande riguardo ai terremoti, la ricerca sui terremoti e più. 
Gli ospiti possono seguire il acitivity sismico recente intorno 
al mondo, osservare i programmi di rischio, o imparare che cosa un 
geophysicist.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οι προσφορές υπέβαλαν συχνά τις ερωτήσεις για τους 
σεισμούς, την έρευνα για τους σεισμούς, και περισσότερων. Οι
επισκέπτες μπορούν να ακολουθήσουν το πρόσφατο σεισμικό 
acitivity σε όλο τον κόσμο, να εμφανίσουν τους χάρτες 
κινδύνου, ή να μάθουν τι ένας γεωφυσικός κάνει.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">las ofertas pidieron con frecuencia preguntas 
acerca de terremotos, la investigación sobre terremotos, y más. 
Los visitantes pueden seguir acitivity sísmico reciente 
alrededor del mundo, visión correspondencias del peligro, o aprender 
lo que lo hace un geophysicist.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206143</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105489</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-earthquake-hazards-program</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
